review: The stick works, but is pretty underpowered. So it runs much slower than the full Fire TV (which I have on our other TV). Apps running on it (like SlingTV and BlazeTV) seem to crash on it a alot unlike the full Fire TV. I would recommend spending the extra money and getting the full Fire TV. You will be much happier.
